prompt:
Answer this question.

		Question: Has every one of the Hunger games books been made into a movie?
		Answer:
answer: The Hunger Games film series has three parts: The Hunger Games, Catching Fire, and Mockingjay. Each part is based on a book in the Hunger Games trilogy. Therefore, every one of the Hunger Games books has been made into a movie.
kaping_triples: (The Hunger Games film series, has part, The Hunger Games), (The Hunger Games, part of the series, The Hunger Games film series), (The Hunger Games film series, has part, Mockingjay), (The Hunger Games film series, has part, Catching Fire), (The Hunger Games film, based on, The Hunger Games), (The Hunger Games, has part, Catching Fire), (film adaptation of The Hunger Games, cast member, Liam Hemsworth), (first Hunger Games film, part of the series, The Hunger Games), (film adaptation of The Hunger Games, director, Gary Ross), (film adaptation of The Hunger Games, production company, Lionsgate Entertainment)
question: Has every one of the Hunger games books been made into a movie?
